name: exterior_singleton_eq_ker_nhds
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
x : X
‚ä¢ Eq (exterior (Singleton.singleton x)) (nhds x).ker
decl: lemma exterior_singleton_eq_ker_nhds (x : X) : exterior {x} = (ùìù x).ker := by simp [exterior]

name: mem_exterior_singleton
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
x y : X
‚ä¢ Iff (Membership.mem (exterior (Singleton.singleton y)) x) (Specializes x y)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_exterior_singleton : x ‚àà exterior {y} ‚Üî x ‚§≥ y := by
  rw [exterior_singleton_eq_ker_nhds, ker_nhds_eq_specializes, mem_setOf]

name: exterior_def
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
s : Set X
‚ä¢ Eq (exterior s) (setOf fun t => And (IsOpen t) (HasSubset.Subset s t)).sInter
decl:
lemma exterior_def (s : Set X) : exterior s = ‚ãÇ‚ÇÄ {t : Set X | IsOpen t ‚àß s ‚äÜ t} :=
  (hasBasis_nhdsSet _).ker.trans sInter_eq_biInter.symm

name: mem_exterior
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
s : Set X

‚ä¢ Iff (Membership.mem (exterior s) x) (‚àÄ (U : Set X), IsOpen U ‚Üí HasSubset.Subset s U ‚Üí Membership.mem U x)
decl: lemma mem_exterior : x ‚àà exterior s ‚Üî ‚àÄ U, IsOpen U ‚Üí s ‚äÜ U ‚Üí x ‚àà U := by simp [exterior_def]

name: subset_exterior_iff
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
s t : Set X
‚ä¢ Iff (HasSubset.Subset s (exterior t)) (‚àÄ (U : Set X), IsOpen U ‚Üí HasSubset.Subset t U ‚Üí HasSubset.Subset s U)
decl:
lemma subset_exterior_iff : s ‚äÜ exterior t ‚Üî ‚àÄ U, IsOpen U ‚Üí t ‚äÜ U ‚Üí s ‚äÜ U := by
  simp [exterior_def]

name: subset_exterior
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
s : Set X
‚ä¢ HasSubset.Subset s (exterior s)
decl: lemma subset_exterior : s ‚äÜ exterior s := subset_exterior_iff.2 fun _ _ ‚Ü¶ id

name: exterior_minimal
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
s t : Set X
h‚ÇÅ : HasSubset.Subset s t
h‚ÇÇ : IsOpen t
‚ä¢ HasSubset.Subset (exterior s) t
decl:
lemma exterior_minimal (h‚ÇÅ : s ‚äÜ t) (h‚ÇÇ : IsOpen t) : exterior s ‚äÜ t := by
  rw [exterior_def]; exact sInter_subset_of_mem ‚ü®h‚ÇÇ, h‚ÇÅ‚ü©

name: IsOpen.exterior_eq
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
s : Set X
h : IsOpen s
‚ä¢ Eq (exterior s) s
decl:
lemma IsOpen.exterior_eq (h : IsOpen s) : exterior s = s :=
  (exterior_minimal Subset.rfl h).antisymm subset_exterior

name: IsOpen.exterior_subset
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
s t : Set X
ht : IsOpen t
‚ä¢ Iff (HasSubset.Subset (exterior s) t) (HasSubset.Subset s t)
decl:
lemma IsOpen.exterior_subset (ht : IsOpen t) : exterior s ‚äÜ t ‚Üî s ‚äÜ t :=
  ‚ü®subset_exterior.trans, fun h ‚Ü¶ exterior_minimal h ht‚ü©

@[simp]
theorem exterior_iUnion (s : Œπ ‚Üí Set X) : exterior (‚ãÉ i, s i) = ‚ãÉ i, exterior (s i) := by

theorem exterior_union (s t : Set X) : exterior (s ‚à™ t) = exterior s ‚à™ exterior t := by

name: exterior_sUnion

theorem exterior_sUnion (S : Set (Set X)) : exterior (‚ãÉ‚ÇÄ S) = ‚ãÉ s ‚àà S, exterior s := by

name: mem_exterior_iff_specializes
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
s : Set X
x : X
‚ä¢ Iff (Membership.mem (exterior s) x) (Exists fun y => And (Membership.mem s y) (Specializes x y))
decl:
theorem mem_exterior_iff_specializes : x ‚àà exterior s ‚Üî ‚àÉ y ‚àà s, x ‚§≥ y := calc
  x ‚àà exterior s ‚Üî x ‚àà exterior (‚ãÉ y ‚àà s, {y}) := by simp
  _ ‚Üî ‚àÉ y ‚àà s, x ‚§≥ y := by
    simp only [exterior_iUnion, mem_exterior_singleton, mem_iUnion‚ÇÇ, exists_prop]

name: exterior_mono
initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Monotone exterior
decl:
@[mono] lemma exterior_mono : Monotone (exterior : Set X ‚Üí Set X) :=
  fun _s _t h ‚Ü¶ ker_mono <| nhdsSet_mono h

see `exterior_subset_exterior_iff_nhdsSet`.

@[gcongr] lemma exterior_subset_exterior (h : s ‚äÜ t) : exterior s ‚äÜ exterior t := exterior_mono h

name: exterior_subset_exterior_iff_nhdsSet

@[simp] lemma exterior_subset_exterior_iff_nhdsSet : exterior s ‚äÜ exterior t ‚Üî ùìùÀ¢ s ‚â§ ùìùÀ¢ t := by
  simp (config := {contextual := true}) only [subset_exterior_iff, (hasBasis_nhdsSet _).ge_iff,
    and_imp, IsOpen.mem_nhdsSet, IsOpen.exterior_subset]

name: nhdsSet_exterior
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
s : Set X
‚ä¢ Eq (nhdsSet (exterior s)) (nhdsSet s)
decl:
@[simp] lemma nhdsSet_exterior (s : Set X) : ùìùÀ¢ (exterior s) = ùìùÀ¢ s := by
  refine le_antisymm ((hasBasis_nhdsSet _).ge_iff.2 ?_) (nhdsSet_mono subset_exterior)
  exact fun U ‚ü®hUo, hsU‚ü© ‚Ü¶ hUo.mem_nhdsSet.2 <| hUo.exterior_subset.2 hsU

name: exterior_exterior
